chipset.docs:
**, string**: Set a chipset to use. See [Supported Chipsets](https://esphome.io/components/light/fastled.html#fastled-spi-chipsets) for options.

*See also: [SPI](https://esphome.io/components/light/fastled.html#id1)*

clock_pin.docs:
**, [Pin](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin)**: The pin for the clock line of the FastLED light.

*See also: [SPI](https://esphome.io/components/light/fastled.html#id1)*

data_pin.docs:
**, [Pin](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin)**: The pin for the data line of the FastLED light.

*See also: [SPI](https://esphome.io/components/light/fastled.html#id1)*

data_rate.docs:
**, frequency**: The data rate to use for shifting data to the light. Can help if you have long cables or slow level-shifters.

*See also: [SPI](https://esphome.io/components/light/fastled.html#id1)*
